```{r}
  library(ggplot2)
  library(fiftystater)
  
  low_color='gray100' 
  high_color="gray0"
  scale_title = 'Average total cost'

  p <- ggplot(StateVsAvgPay, aes(map_id = StateName)) + 
  # map points to the fifty_states shape data
  geom_map(aes(fill = averagePay), map = fifty_states) + 
  expand_limits(x = fifty_states$long, y = fifty_states$lat) +
  coord_map() +
  scale_fill_continuous(low = low_color, high= high_color, guide = guide_colorbar(title = scale_title)) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = NULL) + 
  scale_y_continuous(breaks = NULL) +
  labs(x = "", y = "") +
  theme(legend.position = "right", panel.background = element_blank()) +
  ggtitle('Average Hospital Visit Cost By State')
  
p
    
```
